description: An Indonesian inspired egg fried rice recipe with mixed vegetables.
name: Nasi Goreng with Fried Egg Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and chopped
1 medium red capsicum, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the rice as per packet instructions and then drain and set to one side.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat and add the sesame oil.
Fry the onions, garlic and carrot for 4 minutes.
Crack the eggs into the pan and fry while breaking them up as they cook.
Now add the peas to the pan and fry for a further 3 minutes.
Add the rice to the pan with the rest of the ingredients apart from the scallion and fry for 3 more minutes while tossing.
Remove from the heat and garnish with scallions to serve.
